translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二重層になっている門の両面が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Both sides of the double-layered gate,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一度に落ちた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: fell simultaneously.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おい、これは……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, what is this...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うぐっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこに、音もなく矢の雨が降り注いだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Without a sound, a rain of arrows poured down there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 短く苦鳴を上げて、周囲の魔物兵が倒れる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Letting out short cries of pain, the surrounding monster soldiers fell.
"Tch... Who are you...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アイスフレーム」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ice Flame."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あぁ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして、ゼスの……多くの人々の、代弁者よ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And the spokesman for Zeth... and many of its people."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現れた伏兵達の中心で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the center of the ambushers who appeared,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウルザがクロスボウを構えて立っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Urza stood holding a crossbow ready.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くくくっ……この罠を掛けてくれたのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Heh heh heh... You're the one who set this trap,
aren't you...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私だけではないわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's not only me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……私は、最後の詰めを担当しただけ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...I was just the one who finished the final touch."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貴方を今、そこに立たせているのは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The one making you stand there now...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰の力でもない、ゼスの全ての人の力よ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is not any one person's power, but the strength of all the people of Zeth."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふ、っ……ふっはははははははは！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hu, huh... Hahahahahahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 吹いてくれるわ！　群れた人間ごときが！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll blow you away! You pathetic humans gathered in a swarm!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「見れば、例のカオスを持つという貴様らの切り札も
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Looking around, your trump card said to have Chaos,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いないではないか！　こいつは安心だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: isn't even here! This makes things easier!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「必要ありません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That won't be necessary.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴方は……ゼスの、歩んできた道を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You... the one trying to erase the path Zeth has walked,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無に帰そうという貴方は……ゼスの力で、倒す」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will defeat you with the power of Zeth."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それっぽっちの人間に倒される大将軍ではないわ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm not a great general who could be defeated by mere humans like you!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一度、せせこましい罠に嵌めたくらいで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't get cocky just because you trapped me in some petty trap once.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いい気になるな！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't let it go to your head!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いきます。総員、戦闘配備！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Moving out. All troops, to battle formation!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 熾烈な戦いが始まった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A fierce battle began.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔法に対する耐性が高いツォトンに対して、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Against Tsoton, who has high resistance to magic,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 攻撃魔法は決め手にならない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: offensive magic was not decisive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 必然的に、魔法は付与魔法に限定され、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inevitably, magic was limited to enchantments,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いはそれを受けた戦士達による斬り合いが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the battle centered on sword clashes between the warriors receiving them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中心になっていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They became the core of the battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐおおおおぉぉ！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Guaaaaah!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ツォトンの巨腕の一振りが、周囲の戦士を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One swing of Tsoton's massive arm blew away the surrounding warriors.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まとめて吹き飛ばす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were all blasted aside at once.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「雑魚が！　同じ戦場に立てば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Trash! Did you really think that standing on the same battlefield,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このツォトンを殺せるとでも思ったか！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you could kill this Tsoton!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 倒れ込んだ一人にとどめを刺そうと振り上げた拳に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As Tsoton raised his fist to finish off a fallen man,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウルザの矢が突き刺さって勢いが削がれる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Urza’s arrow pierced it, sapping his momentum.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええいっ……！」
「左翼、下がって！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Left wing, fall back!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 右翼、ツォトンの背後を狙って！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Right wing, aim for Tsoton’s back!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 半包囲します！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We’ll half-encircle him!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウルザの指揮と正確無比な射撃がツォトンを遮り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Urza’s command and pinpoint shooting obstructed Tsoton,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 肉体以上に、精神を追い詰めていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: pushing his spirit more than his body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐ、ぬ、こ、ざかしい、ッ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "G-gu, impudent...!"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

aren't you...!"

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is not any one person's power, but the strength of all the people of Zeth."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふ、っ……ふっはははははははは！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hu, huh... Hahahahahahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 吹いてくれるわ！　群れた人間ごときが！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll blow you away! You pathetic humans gathered in a swarm!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「見れば、例のカオスを持つという貴様らの切り札も
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Looking around, your trump card said to have Chaos,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いないではないか！　こいつは安心だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: isn't even here! This makes things easier!"

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That won't be necessary.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴方は……ゼスの、歩んできた道を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You... the one trying to erase the path Zeth has walked,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無に帰そうという貴方は……ゼスの力で、倒す」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will defeat you with the power of Zeth."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm not a great general who could be defeated by mere humans like you!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一度、せせこましい罠に嵌めたくらいで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't get cocky just because you trapped me in some petty trap once.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いい気になるな！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't let it go to your head!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いきます。総員、戦闘配備！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Moving out. All troops, to battle formation!"

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A fierce battle began.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Against Tsoton, who has high resistance to magic,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 攻撃魔法は決め手にならない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: offensive magic was not decisive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 必然的に、魔法は付与魔法に限定され、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inevitably, magic was limited to enchantments,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いはそれを受けた戦士達による斬り合いが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the battle centered on sword clashes between the warriors receiving them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中心になっていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They became the core of the battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐおおおおぉぉ！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Guaaaaah!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ツォトンの巨腕の一振りが、周囲の戦士を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One swing of Tsoton's massive arm blew away the surrounding warriors.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まとめて吹き飛ばす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were all blasted aside at once.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「雑魚が！　同じ戦場に立てば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Trash! Did you really think that standing on the same battlefield,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このツォトンを殺せるとでも思ったか！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you could kill this Tsoton!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 倒れ込んだ一人にとどめを刺そうと振り上げた拳に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As Tsoton raised his fist to finish off a fallen man,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウルザの矢が突き刺さって勢いが削がれる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Urza’s arrow pierced it, sapping his momentum.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええいっ……！」
「左翼、下がって！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Left wing, fall back!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 右翼、ツォトンの背後を狙って！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Right wing, aim for Tsoton’s back!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 半包囲します！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We’ll half-encircle him!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウルザの指揮と正確無比な射撃がツォトンを遮り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Urza’s command and pinpoint shooting obstructed Tsoton,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 肉体以上に、精神を追い詰めていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: pushing his spirit more than his body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐ、ぬ、こ、ざかしい、ッ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "G-gu, impudent...!"
